text: Selim Bešlagić (born 23 February 1942) is a Bosnian politician who served as the 30th Mayor of Tuzla from 1990 until 2001. Bešlagić was mayor of Tuzla during the Bosnian War of 1992–95. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:Bosniaks of Bosnia and Herzegovina Category:People from Tuzla Category:Mayors of Tuzla Category:Social Democratic Party of Bosnia and Herzegovina politicians
title: Selim Bešlagić
